issue.title: ros camera plugin not publishing camera_info topic

content.raw:
On the other hand, the stereo camera of REEM is properly simulated with the plugin **libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so**. Nevertheless, some strange error appear from time to time. The stereo camera data are defined to be published in the following topics:

* /stereo/left/image
* /stereo/left/camera_info
* /stereo/right/image
* /stereo/right/camera_info

In most cases, when launching gazebo the stereo camera topics are the expected. Nevertheless, in some cases the actual topics are:

* /stereo/image
* /stereo/camera_info
* /stereo/right/image
* /stereo/right/camera_info

Due to some reason the topics of the left camera are published in the stereo namespace.
content.html:
On the other hand, the stereo camera of REEM is properly simulated with the plugin libgazebo_ros_multicamera.so. Nevertheless, some strange error appear from time to time. The stereo camera data are defined to be published in the following topics:

  • /stereo/left/image
  • /stereo/left/camera_info
  • /stereo/right/image
  • /stereo/right/camera_info

In most cases, when launching gazebo the stereo camera topics are the expected. Nevertheless, in some cases the actual topics are:

  • /stereo/image
  • /stereo/camera_info
  • /stereo/right/image
  • /stereo/right/camera_info

Due to some reason the topics of the left camera are published in the stereo namespace.

issue.title: ros camera plugin not publishing camera_info topic

content.raw: Jordi, the gazebo_ros_camera plugin code is in the drcsim repository. I've created an issue there for you: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/163/ros-camera-plugin-not-publishing
content.html: Jordi, the gazebo_ros_camera plugin code is in the drcsim repository. I've created an issue there for you: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/163/ros-camera-plugin-not-publishing

issue.title: ros camera plugin not publishing camera_info topic

content.raw: Steven, thanks a lot and sorry for the inconvinience.
